subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: General Manager Brian Cashman faced questions about the Yankees’ future with a championship foursome of Derek Jeter (36), Mariano Rivera (41 in November), Jorge Posada (39) and Andy Pettitte (38).
snippet: General Manager Brian Cashman faced questions about the Yankees’ future with a championship foursome of Derek Jeter (36), Mariano Rivera (41 in November), Jorge Posada (39) and Andy Pettitte (38).
